summary: Simple change that gives the Nightingale set same enchantments as the Ancient shrouded set.
descriptionHtml:
Didnt like the look of the shrouded armor, but did not like the enchants on the nightingale armor..
So i modified the nightingale so it matches the shrouded enchantments..

Installation: Just put the \"Nightingale_with_DBenchants.esp\" in Skyrims Data folder.
Activate it in the launcher before you press play and there you go.

Shouldnt conflict with textures or anything like that.. 
Could conflict with other .esp tampering with the same original FormIDs of the nightingale armor.

By request
Updated with a optional file:

Nightingale_with_DBenchants _Parts
Separated Armor,gloves and hood into their own esp\'s. Can be combined
Boots are not included since its pretty much the same enchants on both sets.
author: Khaaser
